title: Bonus RP
body: Hey Riot, are you guys planning to do any more of those extra rp for a limited of time? Or have you guys stopped doing it.

replies.body:
Porocles (the other red assigned to Help & Support) and I aren't on the teams that work with promotions, so we aren't given any information on when they're scheduled. Your best bet is to keep your eyes glued on the [News Page](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/), where sales and promotions are announced. 

*Wishes really badly that Deep Sea Nami would go on sale*
